item.title: About
item.description: Understanding Mobility and Cities through Simulation, Data Science and Design Thinking. I am a Data Scientist with a background in transportation science and urban planning. I am from the Netherlands ðŸ‡³ðŸ‡±, but currently I am based in Helsinki, Finland ðŸ‡«ðŸ‡®. I have always been interested in the ways human behaviour and interaction shapes our built environment. In my worklife and studies, I have specialised myself in understanding the relation between mobility and cities, using methods from different disciplines.
